text: Stephen Root (born November 17, 1951) is an American actor, comedian and voice artist. He is best known for doing many voices in movies and TV shows. He voiced Bill Dauterive and Buck Strickland in King of the Hill, Zeb Zoober in The Country Bears, and Junjie in Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness. ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:Actors from Sarasota, Florida Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Living people
title: Stephen Root
